home.title: VJ Technologies
home.introduction: VJ Technologies is an Information Technology company based in Da Nang city. We provide software products and services to customers in many countries, especially in Japan. With a team of highly qualified and experienced engineers in the IT industry, we can provide technology solutions as well as help businesses realize ideas and requirements into quality products. and useful for business.
